        Password - the current user's password
        Returns:
        int 1 if the user can be signed, 0 if user's ID is unknown, -1 if the password is wrong

        public static long CountDaysBetween(java.lang.String D1,
                                    java.lang.String D2)
        This methods counts the days between the given two dates. If the second date is ahead of the first date, it returns negative numbers.
        Parameters:
        D1 - is the first date
        D2 - is the second date
        Returns:
        long the days between the two dates

        public static boolean CheckRoomIsAvailable(Room room,
                                           long Start,
                                           long end)
        This method checks if the given room is available in the given period.
        Parameters:
        room - the given room
        Start - is the number of (start date - today)
        end - is the number of (end date - today)
        Returns:
        boolean true if the room is available

      • CheckAllRooms

        public static boolean CheckAllRooms(int HotelID,
                                    long start,
                                    long end,
                                    int sn,
                                    int dn,
                                    int qn)
        This method checks if all the rooms in the hotel of the current order are available for booking. It calls the CheckRoomIsAvailable() to check the rooms one by one.
        Parameters:
        HotelID - the current hotel
        start - is the number of (start date - today)
        end - is the number of (end date - today)
        sn - is the demand number of single room
        dn - is the demand number of double room
        qn - is the demand number of quad room
        Returns:
        boolean true if all the rooms are available

      • Reserve

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> Reserve(int HotelID,
                                                                                  java.lang.String UserID,
                                                                                  long start,
                                                                                  long end,
                                                                                  int sn,
                                                                                  int dn,
                                                                                  int qn)
        This method runs the given reserve operation.
        Parameters:
        HotelID - is the given Hotel
        UserID - is the current user's ID
        start - is the number of (start date - today)
        end - is the number of (end date - today)
        sn - is the demand number of single room
        dn - is the demand number of double room
        qn - is the demand number of quad room
        Returns:
        ArrayList the list of the reserved room numbers

        public static java.util.ArrayList<AvailableHotelRoom> SearchAvailableHotels(java.lang.String CID,
                                                                            java.lang.String COD,
                                                                            int p,
                                                                            int n)
        This method runs the given Search operation.
        Parameters:
        CID - is the check-in date
        COD - is the check-out date
        p - is the demand number of people
        n - is the demand number of rooms
        Returns:
        ArrayList the list of the available hotel rooms

      • BookHotel

        public static Order BookHotel(java.lang.String CID,
                              java.lang.String COD,
                              int HotelID,
                              int sn,
                              int dn,
                              int qn)
        This method runs the given Reserve operation. It first call the CheckAllRooms() and produce an Order of the given demand.
        Parameters:
        CID - is the check-in date
        COD - is the check-out date
        HotelID - the current hotel's ID
        sn - is the demand number of single rooms
        dn - is the demand number of double rooms
        qn - is the demand number of quad rooms
        Returns:
        Order based on the given demand

        Returns:

      • SortByPrice

        public static java.util.ArrayList<AvailableHotelRoom> SortByPrice(java.util.ArrayList<AvailableHotelRoom> AHR,
                                                                  int op)
        This method sorts the given list AvailableHotelRoom by price. When option is 1, sort in descending order. When option is 2, sort in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        AHR - is the given list
        op - is the option
        Returns:
        ArrayList the sorted list

      • CheckDateforReviseDate

        public static boolean CheckDateforReviseDate(int OrderID,
                                             java.lang.String nCID,
                                             java.lang.String nCOD)
        This method checks whether the revised date is valid. Valid means that the revised date period must be lagrget thean 0, and smaller than the original date period.
        Parameters:
        OrderID - is the given order's ID
        nCID - is the revised check-in date
        nCOD - is the revised check-out date
        Returns:
        boolean true if the revised is valid

                               java.lang.String nCOD)

        Parameters:
